titleStmt.title: Something in answer to a book printed in 1678, called, The hidden things brought to light with Robert Rich of Barbadoes his name to it, and printed for Francis Smith at the Elephant & Castle in Cornhill.
titleStmt.author: Rich, Robert, d. 1679.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Robert Rich by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place of imprint suggested by WIng.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
